item.title: MOSFET and IGBT
item.description: Table of contents N-channel MOSFET Physical view Electrical view Circuit symbol N-channel MOSFET References N-channel MOSFET # Physical view # Current flows between diffusion terminals if the voltage on the Gate large enough to create a conducting channel, otherwise the MOSFET is off and the diffusion terminals are not connected. 1 Electrical view # The four terminals of a Field Effect Transitor are Gate, Source, Drain and Bulk. Circuit symbol # MOSFET and JFET circuit symbols
